formattedAddress: 250 Hudson St Floor 11, New York, NY 10013, USA
adrFormatAddress: 250 Hudson St Floor 11, New York, NY 10013, USA

originalText.text: I purchased a table, they said it would arrive early September, it’s now October and it still has not arrived.  No customer service responds to emails or to calls or on their site live chat is automated responses not a human.  My order status now says completed but I’ve still never received my table so I am left to contest this transaction with my credit card company.  This company has 0 customer service. Purchase at your own risk.

originalText.text: One Kings Lana is terrible! I ordered a dresser. While still waiting for it, THEY sent me an email that it went on sale and they will not honor the new price and provide a price adjustment. Talk about unsavory business practices. Not sure if this violates consumer laws but I will be pursuing. DO NOT BUY FROM THEM

originalText.text: This company is terrible.  They sent us a bedroom set and every piece was damaged save one.  We refused delivery and they then gave the shipper for the replacement pieces the wrong phone number.  After over a month of waiting we began calling and asking for updates.  They just told us it was on the shipper and they couldn't help us and didn't know where the items were.  We kept calling and finally got someone to take the time to call the shipping company and discover they gave them the wrong phone number so we got delivery set up immediately.  This could have been resolved weeks earlier if they would have just tried to help.  Then the new pieces arrived and they were damaged again.  We asked why this keeps happening and they just said it changes hands a lot during shipping.  Other companies we have ordered furniture from were much easier to deal with.  I would recommend avoiding this one.   Mistakes happen but their indifference and lack of desire to help resolve any issue you have is extremely frustrating and compound the mistake.

originalText.text:
I have ordered a few different things from One Kings Lane in anticipation of my move in a couple of weeks. Most have arrived without incident. But last month I ordered a changing table for my baby - a pretty essential item! - knowing that I had to have it as soon as I moved into my apartment. I ordered in early September, and the ship date listed was Sept 24-25. I heard nothing (didn't expect to) and then on September 24 gotten an automated email saying that the item had been cancelled. I called customer service to ask why, was put on hold several times for a total of about 20 minutes, and finally spoke to someone who said she didn't know why it had been cancelled but that she would lodge my complaint and I would be hearing from a customer service representative. I thought that would mean contact with a human who at the very least could help explain what happened and maybe guide me to a similar piece which they could ship expedited. Instead I got another automated email reiterating that the item had been cancelled. Anyway, the whole thing was extremely disappointing. This is the first time in my life I've posted a negative review of a company on line, but I feel like I gave them multiple chances to explain the problem and help resolve it and instead I just got totally indifferent customer service from a robot. I will not be ordering from them again.

UPDATE: In the last 6 weeks, I have placed 5 separate orders with One King's Lane. Of those, two arrived on schedule and were perfectly lovely. Now two (one in addition to the one mentioned above) have been cancelled outright a month after placing the order, and within days of the scheduled ship date. The fifth has been backordered for several months - again, something I wasn't told until weeks after I placed the order. So, the company has only a 40% success rate in getting me the orders I placed. They have not offered any explanation for these multiple problems. Clearly, they are a good curator but have either terrible relationships with their vendors or terrible communication. Of all of the companies I have worked with in decorating my apartment, they are by far the least reliable and also the least helpful from a customer service standpoint. I am extremely disappointed in their service and cannot recommend the company.

originalText.text: One Kings Lane customer service is horrible.  I ordered a throw blanket for decorative purposes (I didn't even use it) and it started shedding and the wool started unraveling.  I called to see if I can exchange it or get a refund 5 weeks later and they said I wasn't within the 30 day policy.  I was very upset because they didn't even ask me for picture of the item or try they just said flat out we can't because of the 30 day return policy.  I under the policy but this is damaged.  they didn't budge.  Take your business somewhere else - I dealt with great customer service from other furniture - household items websites.  This one will never get my business again
